    Make experimental plots/strips inside the field boundary

    make_exp_plots.Rd

    Make experimental plots/strips inside the field boundary, harvester ab-line, and applicator/planter ab-line.

    make_exp_plots(
  input_plot_info,
  boundary_file,
  harvester_width,
  abline_file = NA,
  abline_type = "free",
  headland_length = NA,
  side_length = NA,
  min_plot_length = 61,
  max_plot_length = 91,
  length_unit = "meter",
  perpendicular = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    input_plot_info

    (data.fram or a list of two data.frames) list of plot information created by make_input_plot()

    boundary_file

    (string) path of the field boundary file

    harvester_width

    (numeric) width of the harvester

    abline_file

    (string) path of the ab-line file

    abline_type

    (string) the type of ab-line generation. Select from "free", "lock", and "none"

    headland_length

    (numeric) Default = NA. Length of the headland

    side_length

    (numeric) Default = NA. Length of the sides

    min_plot_length

    (numeric) Default = 61 meter (200 feet) minimum plot length

    max_plot_length

    (numeric) Default = 91 meter (300 feet) maximum plot length

    length_unit

    ("meter" or "feet") Default = "meter", unit of length for harvester_width, headland_length, side_length, min_plot_length, and max_plot_length

    perpendicular

    (logical) Default = FALSE.

    Value

    a tibble that include experimental plots as sf

    Examples

    seed_plot_info <-
  make_input_plot_data(
    form = "seed",
    plot_width = 40,
    machine_width = 60,
    section_num = 24,
    length_unit = "feet"
  )
#> Note: machine_width and plot_width are converted to meter as length_unit is specified as "feet". 

n_plot_info <-
  make_input_plot_data(
    form = "NH3",
    plot_width = measurements::conv_unit(30, "ft", "m"),
    machine_width = measurements::conv_unit(30, "ft", "m"),
    section_num = 1
  )

input_plot_info <- list(seed_plot_info, n_plot_info)

exp_data <-
  make_exp_plots(
    input_plot_info = input_plot_info,
    boundary_file = system.file("extdata", "boundary-simple1.shp", package = "ofpetrial"),
    abline_file = system.file("extdata", "ab-line-simple1.shp", package = "ofpetrial"),
    harvester_width = 30,
    abline_type = "free",
    headland_length = 30,
    side_length = 60,
    min_plot_length = 200,
    max_plot_length = 300,
    length_unit = "feet",
    perpendicular = FALSE
  )
#> Note: length arguments (e.g., harvester_width) are converted to meter as length_unit is specified as "feet". 
#> Linking to GEOS 3.11.0, GDAL 3.5.3, PROJ 9.1.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE

exp_data$exp_plots
